name: G-FORCE WELLNESS SYSTEM
description:
G-FORCE WELLNESS SYSTEM

[The SOFTWARE that helps you COPE]

It’s an electronic psychotherapy assistant with resources, a diary,  4 safe places, inspiration, 2 small games that you can play while being informed & Links to direct help available if and when you need it.

The program starts with the Game Itinerary & Rules screen: -- 

  1. SAFEPLACES: - Here you can find a 4 Safe Places to be -- Each place has a diary to record what you feel & inspiration from a survivor of PTSD.
    • #1 is an ORCHARD – It’s a strawberry & pumpkin patch. With bench seats and butterflies. 
    • #2 is a BEACH SIDE – It’s a quiet seaside escape with trees and seagulls. 
    • #3 is an ISLAND HUT – an island on to itself with butterflies and gulls during twilight 
    • #4 is a LAKESIDE HOUSE – a house by A lake you can HAVE all to yourself – THESE ARE ALL SAFE PLACES TO BE.
  1. SCENARIOS: -- 2 short games.
    • [2] - SCENARIO #1 is a short Game where you traverse a small journey to FIND YOUR Own Therapist.   WATCH out for the GOLD Challenge SPIKES. They lessen your WELLNESS Meter. To MOVE use the A-W-S-D keys. And MOVE thru the GREEN BOXES to HEAL.
    • [3] - SCENARIO #2 is another short Game where you traverse a longer journey for to LEARN  HOW to DEAL with  PTSD.  WATCH out for the MAGENTA TRIGGER SPIKES. They lessen your  WELLNESS Meter. To MOVE use the A-W-S-D keys. And MOVE thru the GREEN BOXES to HEAL.
  • PANIC BUTTONS: -- A place to go for Resources and Info & some counseling.
    • [4] - PANIC BUTTON #1 is A Message from the DESIGNER and a CADRE of RESOURCES to get HEALTH CARE in CRISIS or For Ongoing Care.  
    • [5] - PANIC BUTTON #2 is An Incredibly CANDID TALK about COMPLEX PTSD from Dr. SONYA BRUNER,  LICENSED PSYCHOLOGIST.  It's Symptoms and DIAGNOSIS and a word about Treatment.
  • COMING SOON: --
    • A.I., Meditation, and a LIVE Connection with a Licensed Therapist. A Direct connection to a THERAPIST via Telehealth or [ZOOM], etc.
    •  Haptics and Biometrics - Focus on Calm & Safety. 

CREDITS: --

  2. THE CPTSD FOUNDATION &

PSYCHOLOGIST

  1. 3D MODELS: --  BY SKETCHFAB

Thank you everyone for your help & support as well as viewing my project.
